error_message_quota_has_been_reached.description: There is an API error when the user reaches his quota and therefore is not longer able to use the pro endpoint and if does not get logged out he can not longer use the extension. We need to show him a message so the user knows why he logged out

error_message_too_many_requests.message: عذراً، لكن تعذّرت ترجمة نصك. يبدو أن شبكتك ترسل حالياً عدداً كبيراً جداً من الطلبات إلى خوادمنا.
error_message_too_many_requests.description: Info for free users that too many requests are triggered

extension_settings_keyboard_shortcut_per.description: This text will be displayed in the settings screen of the browser (we can only set the label here).

firefox_add_on_store_body_content.message:
With the DeepL for Chrome extension, you can enjoy DeepL’s unbeatable translation quality without ever leaving your browser.

You’ll be able to effortlessly and instantly translate as you’re reading or writing within Chrome. If you’re a DeepL Pro user, that includes entire web pages. 
If you’re a free user, we’re working on releasing this feature for you too. Until then, you can simply select any text and the DeepL icon will appear. To translate your selection, click on the icon. If you want to translate even faster, set up your own shortcuts in the settings, for both reading or writing with DeepL on Chrome.

Now you no longer have to worry about missing out on any information throughout the web due to a language barrier. 

Download DeepL for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Translate while reading
You won’t have to skip emails, articles, or websites anymore. You can view the content you’re browsing in Chrome in your chosen language, in its original context. 

Translate your writing
Whether you’re writing a social media post, chat message, or email, you can translate your own words immediately after you type them. This means you no longer have to copy, paste, retype, or leave Chrome to communicate in another language.

Full-page translations
If you’re a DeepL Pro user, you can translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. To make things even easier, you can choose to have all websites in specific languages automatically translated for a seamless browsing experience. We’re working on releasing this feature for free users too. 

DeepL Pro login 
DeepL Pro users can log in to their accounts through the extension.

Shortcuts
Use simple shortcuts to make translation quicker and easier. You can set your own shortcuts in the settings.

Unparalleled accuracy
You can rest assured that you’re getting the best possible translations on the website or application you’re using. DeepL translations consistently outperform the competition and are proven to be three times more accurate than translations from major tech companies.

Loved by millions of users
Millions of people around the world use DeepL every day to improve their communication.

Choose between 27 languages
For a list of the languages available in the extension, check out this article in our Help Center: https://support.deepl.com/hc/en-us/articles/4407573562386-Languages-in-the-browser-extension

firefox_add_on_store_description.message: استخدم مُترجِم DeepL، المُترجِم الأدقّ في العالم، لترجمة ما تقرأه وتكتبه.

firefox_add_on_store_title.message: مُترجِم DeepL: اقرأ واكتب في أيّ لغة تشاء
firefox_add_on_store_title.description:
There is a character limit of 50 on the Firefox store, so many of the existing titles from Chrome will not work in other languages. 

Note: after trying to upload these to the store, it turns out the title cannot use "Firefox" or "Mozilla"

firefox_beta_share_feedback_link.message: ساعدنا على تحسين ملحق ‎DeepL‏ لمتصفّح ‎Firefox‏ من خلال <feedbackLink>مشاركة تعقيباتك معنا</feedbackLink>
firefox_beta_share_feedback_link.description: A part of the main extension popup window that asks users to give their feedback about the extension for Firefox

firefox_browser_permissions_popup_body.message: Allow your Firefox browser to give DeepL access to the websites you visit.

firefox_legal_disclaimer_body_main.message:
إذا كنت تريد استخدام ملحق DeepL لمتصفح Firefox، نحتاج إلى إذن منك للوصول إلى النصوص التي تودّ ترجمتها أو تحسينها ولمعالجتها أثناء التصفح. لا يمكن لملحق DeepL معالجة محتوى صفحات إلكترونية كاملة إلا إذا شغّلتَ ميزة ترجمة الصفحة بكاملها.

عندما تسجل الدخول إلى ملحق DeepL لمتصفح Firefox باستخدام حسابك، نعالج بياناتك الشخصية اللازمة لتوفير الميزات التي يمكنك الاستفادة منها في إطار خطتك.

ونجمع أيضاً بيانات تقنية وبيانات متعلقة بالجهاز وبالاستخدام من أجل ضمان تشغيل ملحق DeepL لمتصفح Firefox بشكل صحيح ضمن المتصفح ورصد أيّ سلوك الاحتيالي ومنعه.

يمكنك الاطّلاع على مزيد من المعلومات عن سياساتنا في الرابطين التاليين:
firefox_legal_disclaimer_body_main.description: To use DeepL for Firefox, we need your permission to access and process the texts that you request to be translated or improved while browsing. Only if you turn on the full-page translation feature do you allow us to process the content of whole web pages.    When you log in to DeepL for Firefox with your account, we will process your personal data needed to provide the features accessible under your plan.    We also collect technical, device, and usage data to make sure that the DeepL Firefox extension runs properly on your browser and to detect and prevent fraudulent behavior.    You can read more about our policies here:

firefox_legal_disclaimer_link_two.message: <termsLink>شروط الخدمة</termsLink> للمستخدمين الذين ليس لديهم حساب DeepL (Pro)
firefox_legal_disclaimer_link_two.description: <termsLink>Terms of service</termsLink> for users without a DeepL (Pro) account

onboarding_full_page_translation_table_i.message: استفد أيضاً من ميزات إضافية في المُترجِم الإلكتروني والتطبيقات:

onboarding_inline_translation_descriptio.message: ترجمة أيّ نص تختاره بالنقر على أيقونة ‎DeepL‏ أو بتنشيط المُختصَر.

onboarding_last_step_description.message: انضمّ إلى آلاف الأشخاص الذين يستفيدون من جودة ترجمات ‎DeepL‏ بينما يتصفّحون الإنترنت.

onboarding_pin_extension.message: تثبيت ملحق ‎DeepL‏ هنا للوصول الفوري إليه

onboarding_promotion_body.message: صُمِّم ملحق DeepL للمتصفح بطريقة تتيح استخدامه في أدوات الإنتاجية الأكثر شيوعاً في العالم.

onboarding_promotion_body_2.message: اختَر أداتك المفضلة لكي تتمكّن من تضمين DeepL بكل سلاسة في سير عملك.

onboarding_promotion_header.message: ترجم نصوصك وحسّن كتابتك بفضل أداتك المفضلة

onboarding_promotion_login_notification.message: لقد سجّلتَ الدخول إلى حسابك الجديد في DeepL.

onboarding_signup_body.message: أنشئ حساب DeepL لتحقيق أقصى استفادة من ملحق DeepL، مجاناً!

onboarding_successful_login_notification.description: The screenshot is an example of the context and location for this copy, but referring to a new account. This key is for when a user has an account and successfully logs in, and will appear in the same place and style as the "account created" notification.

onboarding_translate_description.message: انقر على أيقونة DeepL أو شغّل المختصر لترجمة النص الذي تودّ قراءته أو إنشاءه. يمكن تفعيله في آلاف المنصات المختلفة.

onboarding_translate_title.message: ترجم النصوص التي تقرأها أو تكتبها

onboarding_write_description_2.message: هذه الميزة متوفرة باللغات الإنكليزية والألمانية والفرنسية والإسبانية وغيرها.

ui_share_success.description:
A button to share the link of the Chrome extension to my friends

If I click on that button:
- The link to the Chrome Store is copied into the clipboard
- A message is sent to the user confirming this and letting them know that they can share that link with their friends.

ui_toaster_how_was_your_experience_line_.description:
See bottom right of the screenshot. A message pops up when the user has done a few translations, asking them to give feedback on the Firefox extension

Note: The rest of the pop-up has already been translated for Chrome (e.g. "How has your experience been?")

The second line of the first screen of the popup window that appears after the user has used the extension for a bit, asking for their feedback. 

The source copy is identical to the original Chrome key, but this will only be used on Firefox
